title: Whitebread Little Mountain Towns
name: Whitebread Little Mountain Towns
description:
A Map by Repressd

Whitebread mountain towns I have visited.

properties.name: Aspen, CO
properties.description: Posted by Repressdaspen, co

properties.name: Bend, OR
properties.description: Posted by RepressdBend, ORVisited here on vacation during high school.

properties.name: Breckenridge, CO
properties.description: Posted by RepressdBreckenridge, COOne of only two places I\'ve skied in my life.

properties.name: Challis, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdChallis, IDSounds prettier than it actually is. You can purchase a drink at the bar and literally get a "to go" cup and take it with you in your car.

properties.name: Clayton, ID
properties.description: Posted by Repressdclayton, idOne of the tiniest towns I\'ve ever seen.

properties.name: Coeur D'Alene, ID
properties.description: Posted by Repressdwallace, idVisited on a high school vacation. Flew around the lake in a seaplane.

properties.name: Copper Mountain, CO
properties.description: Posted by Repressdcopper mountain, coThe only other place Ive ever skied.

properties.name: Crouch, ID
properties.description: Posted by Repressdgarden valley, idWhat a name for a town!

properties.name: Drake, CO
properties.description: Posted by RepressdDrake, COSite of the Big Thompson Canyon flash flood in 1976. It happened before I was born, but I have heard about it all my life.

properties.name: Estes Park
properties.description: Posted by RepressdÂ estes park, coWe visited MacGregor Ranch in 5th Grade.

properties.name: Fraser, CO
properties.description: Posted by RepressdFraser, COThis was known as "The Icebox of the Nation" when I lived in Colorado.

properties.name: Georgetown, CO
properties.description: Posted by RepressdGeorgetown, COEveryone who\'s ever lived in Colorado has been here at least once!

properties.name: Glenwood springs
properties.description: Posted by RepressdGlenwood Springs, COI visited here in high school. The hot springs pool is world famous and the nearby Colorado Hotel was reportedly a hideout of Al Capone. Interestingly, the pool is shaped like a coffin. Visit Doc Holiday\'s grave in nearby Linwood Cemetery.

properties.name: Heber City
properties.description: Posted by RepressdSnowbird, UT

properties.name: Ketchum, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdKetchum, IDWent through here on the way to my friend\'s wedding in Salmon. Reminded me of Colorado.

properties.name: Lyons, CO
properties.description: Posted by RepressdLyons, COOn the way from Boulder to Estes Park.

properties.name: McCall, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdMcCall, ID

properties.name: Park City, UT
properties.description: Posted by RepressdPark City, UTI went here for vacation a few summers ago.

properties.name: Placerville, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdPlacerville, IDWe used to visit the museum here when I was in high school.

properties.name: Reno, NV
properties.description: Posted by RepressdReno, NVThe ugliest place I have ever seen.

properties.name: Salmon, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdSalmon, IDMy friend Kelly is from here. I went to her wedding in Salmon last summer and it was really fun.

properties.name: Sandpoint, ID
properties.description: Posted by RepressdSandpoint, IDVisited on a high school vacation. The lake is so deep that the Navy used to test submarines here.

properties.name: Santa Fe, NM
properties.description: Posted by RepressdÂ Â Â santa fe, nm

properties.name: Snowmass Village, CO
properties.description: Posted by Repressdsnowmass, coThis is one of the cutest little towns!

properties.name: Stanley, ID
properties.description: Posted by Repressdstanley, idOddly, enough, the same year I moved to Idaho, the Icebox of the Nation was switched from Fraser, CO, to Stanley, ID.

properties.name: Tahoe, CA
properties.description: Posted by Repressdtahoe, ca

properties.name: Truckee, CA
properties.description: Posted by RepressdTruckee, CAWe went through here on the way to San Francisco.

properties.name: Vail, CO
properties.description: Posted by IbbuneeVail, CODecember 2004 - 1st snowboarding trip together
